input.sentences: the racers started their practice laps before the actual race began .
the announcers cued the bikers to take their marks .
[male] robinson was in first place for the most part .
robinson ended up finishing first that day .
output.sentences: The racers started the race together and quickly dispersed.
There were marks, which cued the bikers on where to proceed.
A male biker, named Robinson, took the lead early.
The bikes swept by at lightning speed.
Finishing first that day was Robinson, as might have been anticipated.
